text: Tomasz Świątek (born 26 July 1964) is a Polish rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1988 Summer Olympics, in which Poland won the "B" Final to finish seventh overall. He is the father of Iga Świątek, a professional tennis player who won the 2020 French Open. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Poland Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Warsaw
title: Tomasz Świątek
